p: This analysis is grounded in Connellâ€™s theory of Gender and Power which acknowledges that patriarchal structures in society place many men at social and physical advantage over women [ 9]. As such, women face more severe consequences from experiences of IPV and consequently why we only examined the relationship between SRP equity and experiences of IPV among young women in our sample. We acknowledge that young men do face controlling behaviours, SRP inequity and IPV within their relationships, however unpacking SRP equity and experiences of IPV among young South African men is beyond the scope of this paper.
